adDetails: Are you planning a special event? Do you need FUN music? Are you on a budget? We can help. For years we have provided low cost DJ service for Weddings, Debuts, Birthdays, Parties, Crab Feeds, and School Dances. We cover music from 1940 to 2014 which includes Rock, Hip Hop, R&B, Country, Latin, Disco, Motown, Oldies, Jazz and much more. We offer special lighting with our package. Our rates are reasonable and affordable. Give us a call today to hold your date.
